Human Interface Coin Games!

On this website we have three games:

  • Flip One Coin: Press the button to flip a coin and an image of that coin will appear.
  • Flip Many Coins: Enter in how many coins you want to flip and you will be shown the results of how many were heads and how many were tails.
  • Guess the Flip of A Coin: Guess which side the coin will land on when it flips.
